text: A tropical storm warning was issued for New York City and the Connecticut coast, with authorities warning residents to prepare for “multiple hazards” caused by the newly formed Tropical Storm Fay https://t.co/EYbJ2gfepf

text: NEW: A GOP member of the Alabama state Senate serving on the state’s coronavirus task force says he’s not fazed by a recent surge in confirmed cases. In fact, he would “like to see more people” contract the virus in order to build herd immunity. https://t.co/r3R3tNDLMo

text: "Donald Trump loves to talk ... and talk … and talk," Biden said. "But after three and a half years of big promises, what do the American people have to show for all the talk?" https://t.co/NCTdZThUns
